# textInput

**Instance Property**

The text input object that manages the selection.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var textInput: (any UITextInput)? { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to refer to the text input view that manages the text selection. You specify this view when you create the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextSelectionDisplayInteraction] object.
